name: Green Dragon Wyrmling
senses: Blindsight 10 ft., Darkvision 60 ft.,  Passive Perception 14

specialAbilities.name: Amphibious
specialAbilities.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath
actions.description: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
